text: Souleuvre-en-Bocage is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Beaulieu, Le Bény- Bocage (the seat), Bures-les-Monts, Campeaux, Carville, Étouvy, La Ferrière- Harang, La Graverie, Malloué, Montamy, Mont-Bertrand, Montchauvet, Le Reculey, Saint-Denis-Maisoncelles, Sainte-Marie-Laumont, Saint-Martin-des-Besaces, Saint-Martin-Don, Saint-Ouen-des-Besaces, Saint-Pierre-Tarentaine and Le Tourneur.Arrêté préfectoral 1 December 2015 == Related pages == * Communes of the Calvados department == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Souleuvre-en-Bocage
